com.daw.pms.Service.Bilibili

Interface BiliResourceService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BiliResourceServiceImpl

    public interface BiliResourceService
    Service for handling resources in bilibili.
    Since:
    8/2/23
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Daw Loph

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Result getDetailResource(String bvid, String cookie)
      Get detail resource of bilibili.
      Result getResourceDashLink(String bvid, Long cid, String cookie)
      Get resource's dash links of bilibili.
      Result searchResources(String searchType, String keyword, String order, Integer duration, Integer tids, Integer page, String cookie)

    • Method Detail

      • getDetailResource

        Result getDetailResource(String bvid,
                         String cookie)
        Get detail resource of bilibili.
        Parameters:
        bvid - The bvid of this resource.
        cookie - Your cookie for bilibili.
        Returns:
        Detail resource of bilibili, wrapped with Result DTO, the data is BiliDetailResource.
        API Note:
        GET GET_DETAIL_RESOURCE?bvid=bvid&wts=wts&w_rid=w_rid

      • getResourceDashLink

        Result getResourceDashLink(String bvid,
                           Long cid,
                           String cookie)
        Get resource's dash links of bilibili.
        Parameters:
        bvid - The resource's bvid.
        cid - The resource's cid.
        cookie - Your cookie for bilibili.
        Returns:
        The links of this resource, wrapped with Result DTO, the data is BiliLinksDTO.
        API Note:
        GET GET_RESOURCE_DASH_LINKS?bvid=bvid&cid=cid&fnval=16&fourk=1&platform=html&high_quality=1&wts=wts&w_rid=w_rid

      • searchResources

        Result searchResources(String searchType,
                       String keyword,
                       String order,
                       Integer duration,
                       Integer tids,
                       Integer page,
                       String cookie)
        Search resources in bilibili.
        Parameters:
        searchType - The type of search, can be video, media_bangumi and so on.
        keyword - The keyword to search.
        order - The sorting order of searched result, totalrank: by overall, click: by click times, pubdate: by publish date, dm: by danmaku number, stow: by collected times, scores: by comments number.
        duration - Filter the result by duration, 0: all duration, 1: less than 10 minutes, 2: 10 to 30 minutes, 3: 30 to 60 minutes, 4: more than 60 minutes.
        tids - Filter by the section number, default is 0(all sections).
        page - The page number.
        cookie - Your cookie for bilibili.
        Returns:
        Searched resources wrapped with Result DTO, the data is PagedDataDTO.
        API Note:
        GET SEARCH_RESOURCES?search_type=searchType&keyword=keyword&order=order&duration=duration&tids=tids&page=page
